name: Misty Island
overview: Misty Island is a standard text adventure for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Dorothy Millard and published by The Adventure Workshop in 1994. Story: You know too much, and have been unceremoniously dumped semiconscious on a remote misty island, with no food, to die. Of course this doesn't appeal to you, dying, that is! Can you find a way to survive this nightmare, and even escape back to civilization? In your semiconscious state, you hear spies whispering about "hiding the evidence". The men leave you to regain consciousness. Now it's up to you.
